forbidden.title: Access denied

socket.connectionFailed: The connection to the server failed

length.content: Your username cannot be empty or go over 16 characters
length.title: Invalid username format

credits.description: Better Fleet was developed in order to facilitate the formation of alliances on Sea Of Thieves
credits.details: Better Fleet is a non-official third party application unrelated to the development team of Sea Of Thieves. Its use is purely external and has no impact on gameplay experience !
credits.title: Information

button.description: Hoist the sails lads, take the helm and head out to sea !
button.title: Let the journey begin

firstLogin.description: Please enter your current gamertag to oversee the smooth running of the alliance
firstLogin.tips: You can change your username at any moment in the settings
firstLogin.title: What's your name lad ?

loading.tips: This process might take a while, please make sure your game is launched

choice.createComment: Take a bite at freedom and rule on the sea of thieves !
choice.joinComment: Grab a tankard, come aboard and join the crew !

modal.comment: Every session is private and requires an identification code. Ask it to the host of the session you wish to join !
modal.title: Enter a Session ID
